ygData.subject: Thermal yada yada
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok we have discovered the gemcutter hurray! As for the thermal cloak. Staying with the idea that it can t be made and it is a mob drop just like the diamond
ygData.messageBody:
Ok we have discovered the gemcutter hurray! As for the thermal cloak.
Staying with the idea that it can't be made and it is a mob drop just
like the diamond dust and the fact that diamond dust is a HIGH level mob
drop. I was wondering if anyone has killed Toko Binlittle in OOT? He himself
is not a high level npc but the giant that stands next to him is, 40's or so
I hear. Just a thought.

Grundup PuddlejumperTinkerTot
